name: The Swizzle Collective
description: The Swizzle Collective is a small, full-service advertising agency specializing in brand strategy and creative development. We're based in Austin, TX and were founded in 2009 when our first client, Velocity Credit Union, entrusted us with their multi-media "Switch" campaign. Since that time, we've added an entire roster of clients, both local and national, including Austin Bodyworker, Threadgill's, Withdrawal Ease and Carved Creations.
